page.title: 15Carrick District Offices
page.content:
The offices of the{Carrick District {Council}are in Pydar Street. It houses the majority of the departments of the Council . The departments are:
Chief Executive Personnel & Management Finance Planning & Development Control Housing Environmental Services Maritime Secretary & Solicitors
The staff working in the offices total {289.}The rest of Carrick staff is made up of{215}manual workers.
Carrick District population... = 77000 " " area in hectares = 46074 {Population per hectare........ = 1.67
